dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1878 IH: To prohibit any hiring freeze from affecting the Small Business Administration.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Vel√°zquez (for herself, Mr. Evans, Ms. Clarke of New York, Mrs. Murphy of Florida, Mr. Lawson of Florida, Ms. Judy Chu of California, Ms. Adams, Mr. Espaillat, and Mr. Schneider) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To prohibit any hiring freeze from affecting the Small Business Administration.

section.header: Prohibition on hiring freeze from affecting Small Business Administration
section.text: The memorandum titled Presidential Memorandum Regarding the Hiring Freeze published on January 23, 2017, or any other substantially similar memorandum, Executive order, or other action by the President to prevent a department or agency of the Federal Government from filling vacant Federal civilian employee positions or creating new such positions, shall have no force or effect with respect to positions within the Small Business Administration.
